parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: invalid_op_return_data_push
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: OP_RETURN followed by OP_1 (not a data push)

parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: invalid_tlv_length_exceeds_remaining
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: ArkadeMagic + type byte + length that exceeds remaining data
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.expected_error: invalid TLV length for OP_RETURN payload

parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: missing_op_return_payload_no_markers
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: ArkadeMagic + unknown type marker (0x99) + valid TLV - no asset or subdust

parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: empty_payload_no_tlv
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: ArkadeMagic only, no TLV entries - loop never entered

parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: truncated_tlv_length
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: ArkadeMagic + type byte but no length

parse_packet_opreturn_errors.name: truncated_tlv_value
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.description: ArkadeMagic + type + length but incomplete value
parse_packet_opreturn_errors.expected_error: invalid TLV length for OP_RETURN payload
